benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Blindsight
effects: You have Blindsight with a range of 10 feet.

benefits.name: Fog of War
effects: You exploit the distractions of battle, gaining Advantage on any Dexterity (Stealth) check you make as part of the Hide action during combat.

benefits.name: Sniper
effects: If you make an attack roll while hidden and the roll misses, making the attack roll doesn't reveal your location.
